card_text: (This card is always treated as an "Ursarctic" and "Drytron" card.)$NMust be Special Summoned with "Ursarctic Drytron". Once per turn, if another Effect Monster is Special Summoned to your field (except during the Damage Step): You can add 1 "Ursarctic" or "Drytron" monster from your Deck to your hand. Once per turn: You can target 1 of your banished "Ursarctic" or "Drytron" monsters; add it to your hand.
